thread.title: Packers-Eagles watch party to be held Friday at Titletown
thread.title_full: Packers-Eagles watch party to be held Friday at Titletown

author: , Packers News
title: Packers-Eagles watch party to be held Friday at Titletown
text: Packers' Brazil-game watch party on Friday to include live music, alumni Q&A, food trucks James Jones and Greg Jennings will take part in a Q&A at the Packers-Eagles watch party at Titletown on Friday. ASHWAUBENON – Live music and a Q&A with former [Green Bay Packers](https://sportsdata.usatoday.com/football/nfl/teams/green-bay-packers/335) star receivers James Jones and Greg Jennings will be part of the team's watch party Friday at Titletown. The watch party is for the Packers- [Philadelphia Eagles](https://sportsdata.usatoday.com/football/nfl/teams/philadelphia-eagles/354) game at 7:15 p.m. Friday in São Paulo, Brazil. The event is free, but requires registration, which can be completed at [titletown.com/events/titletown-watch-party.](https://url.us.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/55YRCERXz9S0Rz59RSPQZ7o?domain=u7061146.ct.sendgrid.net) The event begins at 5 p.m. at Ariens Hill in Titletown, when the band [Road Trip](https://www.roadtripband.com/) will play. A Q&A period and meet-and-greet with Jones and Jennings will follow. Attendees can reserve spots on the hill by placing blankets and lawn chairs on the hill starting at 4 p.m. Seating is first-come, first-served. A large-screen will be at the base of the hill. Food trucks, tailgate-style offerings and Brazilian-inspired food and beverages will be available for purchase. A reminder that Titletown is cashless, so bring a different form of payment. The evening will include giant tailgate games, face painting, a 360 photo booth and cheese carver. There will be make-a-sign, postcard and custom-hat stations and live art mural painting. A network camera will be at the watch party and live footage from event might be featured on the game broadcast if time permits. More: [The connections Brazil has to the Green Bay Packers hit close to home for the South American nation’s cheeseheads](https://www.packersnews.com/story/sports/nfl/packers/2024/09/05/brazil-cheeseheads-feel-strong-connection-to-green-bay-packers/74999679007/) More: [Here are 5 things to watch as the Green Bay Packers face the Philadelphia Eagles in a Week 1 game in São Paulo, Brazil](https://www.packersnews.com/story/sports/nfl/packers/2024/09/05/5-things-to-watch-green-bay-packers-week-1-game-vs-philadelphia-eagles/75066638007/) Registered attendees can win Packers giveaways, prizes and autographed items. Also, attendees can bring hygiene and household items for donation to Friends of Pals, Youth and Families, which benefits Brown County children who need assistance. Contact Richard Ryman at [rryman@gannett.com](mailto:rryman@gannett.com). Follow him on Twitter at [@RichRymanPG,](https://twitter.com/RichRymanPG) on Instagram at [@rrymanPG](https://www.instagram.com/rrymanpg/) or on Facebook at [www.facebook.com/RichardRymanPG](https://www.facebook.com/RichardRymanPG/)
